BG3 Twist of Fortune Information

Twist of Fortune: When you roll 2 or less with this weapon's damage die, reroll it and take the new result. Tenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway. Blood Money: Strike out greedily, dealing additional per 300 gold that the target possesses. The gold will be consumed. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Twist of Fortune Location & Where to Find

Location: Reithwin Town. Dropped by: Gerringothe Thorm in the Reithwin Tollhouse.
